{Cloud}'s Past

Received "Peacemaker"!

{Barret}
“This is Kalm.”

{Aeris}
“We've reached Kalm.”

{Tifa}
“So this is Kalm?”

{Red XIII}
“…This must be Kalm.”

{Barret}
“Yo, I'll be waitin' at the inn…
Hurry and get your butt over there!”

{Aeris}
“I wonder if everyone's there already?
Let's hurry over to the inn!”

{Tifa}
“Everyone's waiting at the inn.
Let's go {Cloud}.”

{Red XIII}
“We're supposed to meet at the inn.
…Shall we go?”

{Barret}
“Get over here!”

{Aeris}
“Well then, I'll go on ahead.”

{Tifa}
“Let's go {Cloud}.”

{Red XIII}
“Let's go {Cloud}.”

“Thanks to the Mako energy
Shinra, Inc. develops for us,
everything's more convenient now.”
“Maybe a little too convenient.”

“I hear that the natural resources
near the reactors are being sucked dry.”{PAUSE}“We're better off with
the Mako energy.”

“The famous floating city, Midgar…
Just once I'd love to see it in person.”

“What does it do?
It checks the pressure of the
Mako energy sent from Midgar.”
“This is the Item Store.”
“This is the Weapons Store.”
“This is the Materia Store.”

“I heard terrorists bombed a Midgar reactor…”{PAUSE}“There have been a lot of dangerous accidents
recently. I hate it, just hate it.”

“It seems there was this group
called AVALANCHE runnin' around,
but I guess SOLDIER
finally wiped them out.”

“Shinra is trying to eliminate anyone,
who stands up to them.”{PAUSE}“It don't matter if we like it or not.
Shinra's taken over,
and we gotta live with it!”
“Stay out of the kitchen.”

“I heard President Shinra was killed.
And his son Rufus, the new president,
was badly hurt.”{PAUSE}“Hey, I bet that's news to you.”
{CHOICE}You're pretty smart!
{CHOICE}Don't care…

“Heh, heh…Just between us…
I heard it was them
Ava-whaddya call-ums that got
President Shinra and his son.”

“Don't care?
If you're going to travel,
you'd best keep an eye on
what Shinra's doing.”

“When I grow up I'm gonna be in SOLDIER.
That's why I'm training hard now!!”

“My older brother's so stupid.
He's so embarrassing I could just puke!”
“Hyah, hayah, eagghh!”
“Hyah, hayah, eagghh!”
“Hyah, hayah, eagghh!”

“Thanks to Mako energy,
life's pretty darn convenient.
Thanks to Shinra.”{PAUSE}“Don't you think?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, maybe
{CHOICE}You're full of it

“See!?
How would we get by
without Mako energy?”

“Hmm.
But I'd hate to think of what life'd
be like without Mako energy.”

“Mako energy's made things
a lot more convenient…”{PAUSE}“But a lot of plants and animals
have been disappearing at a rapid pace.”{PAUSE}“I think the old life was better.”{PAUSE}“Don't you think so?”
{CHOICE}Yeah, maybe
{CHOICE}No way

“Yeah, sure I'm right!
You think so, don't you?”
“That's just what my mom said.”

“Yeah, Mako energy's made life
much easier.
And it's all thanks to Shinra, Inc.”

“Things were better when
you could play with animals…”

“Listen to me!
Something really big's happening
in Midgar.”{PAUSE}“They were just saying on TV it was
Rufus' second strategy and…”{PAUSE}“That big cannon's pointed due north…
Do you think the target is Sephiroth?”

“Everyone at Shinra's in an uproar
because they heard Weapon's coming.”{PAUSE}“I heard a big hydroplane carrying
secret weapons, was attacked by Weapon
and was sunk at sea…”

“If something ever happened to
President Rufus,
That'd be the end of Shinra, Inc.
and the rest of the world, too.”

“Did you say you came
from Midgar?”{PAUSE}“I used to live there, too.
But I heard they got
lots of troubles lately.”

“Is it true
that Shinra makes monsters?”
{CHOICE}It's true
{CHOICE}Just a rumor

“Yeah, well either way,
as long as we use reactors,
we can't stand up to Shinra.”

“There was a suspicious-looking man
in a black cloak!
He was carrying a mean-looking sword.”

“They say Midgar's in the middle of a war
between the Shinra and
some terrorists called AVALANCHE.”

“20 gil a night.
What's it gonna be?”
{CHOICE}Stay?
{CHOICE}Move on

“Mr…{Cloud}?
Your party is waiting for you
on the 2nd floor.”

“Shinra's leading the world around
by the nose,
and you guys are just gonna
sit back and take it?”

“Me? I used to work in a mine
down south called {CYAN}Mythril Mine{WHITE}”{PAUSE}“But, awhile back,
monsters started appearing.”{PAUSE}“After that, business went to pot
and now I spend the days here drinking.”

“Urrrp!…hic…
I'm stinking drunk!!”

“Seems like you're a little short.
Why don't you drop by again…
when you have money.”

“Why doesn't anyone believe me?
I'm so lonely…”

“Listen to me!{OK}
Just now, some guy in a black cloak
walked east towards that grassy field.”{PAUSE}“He's got this killer sword,
and looks REAL scary…”

“Aw, c'mon! Listen to me!{OK}
Got anything interesting to say?”
Locked. Can't open it…

“I gotta hurry up and get strong so
I can crush Meteor to bits!
But I gotta train real hard to do it.”

“Oh man, oh man!”{PAUSE}“Meteor's gonna fall on us, and
now some huge monster
like I've never seen
is wandering around out there!”

“What's going to happen
to all of us?”

“I want you to stop that talk
about Meteor falling on us!”

“Listen, I work hard…and now you're
tellin' me Meteor's gonna smash
everything to bits?”{PAUSE}“Well, I ain't standin' around
listenin' to fool talk like this.
Makes a person lose the will to work,
that's what it does!”

“What're ya, dense?
Something like that'll never happen!
It's ridiculous!”

“And all of Midgar's gonna be
destroyed by a falling meteor?
Oh, don't make me laugh!”{PAUSE}“There's been a number of scary
incidents lately.
I hate it. Just hate it!”

“I heard the remaining members of AVALANCHE
smashed the Shinra troops at Midgar.”{PAUSE}“Lately, there's been a number of
scary incidents.
I hate it. Just hate it!”

“They say the remaining members of AVALANCHE
broke Shinra's resistance and destroyed
the Mako cannon at Midgar.”
“What's going to happen to the world?”

“I heard Shinra's taking it's
biggest artillery from Junon and
other facilities and gathering it
in Midgar to fight Meteor and Weapon.”

“Even if Meteor falls,
you ought to be safe
as long as you're in Midgar.”{PAUSE}“They say it's a "Mako Metropolis"
so it will survive.”

“Ah, youth…
You really believe that big meteor
filling up the sky is going to fall?”

“If that's the case then all we can do is
put our hope in Shinra, Inc.”

“If Shinra, Inc. was our last hope,
and they've been beaten by terrorists…
are we all going to die?”

“Meteor's going to fall, isn't it?
Then we're all history unless
Shinra does something about it!”

“Why're you checking the Mako energy
pressure at a time like this?
It's probably already too late.”{PAUSE}“You can't go into a tail spin
at a time like this.
You've got to keep living
just like before.”{PAUSE}“At least that's what I think…”

“They say Meteor's going to fall,
but that's okay!
I'm sure Shinra'll come
through for us in the end!”

“Dear, can you believe it?
They say that Shinra's gone under!!”{PAUSE}“This world is coming to an end all
because some terrorists called AVALANCHE
stuck their noses in the wrong place!”

“I can't believe Meteor's really
falling this way…
What's going to happen to us?”

“I can't believe Meteor's really
falling this way…
What's going to happen to us?”

“Meteor's coming, right?
Where will I stash my money?
Wait, maybe I'd better take it
with me and get out of here!”

“One night, 300 gil.
Wanna check in?”
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

“Tourists, huh?{OK}
Here are a few things you should
know that will come in handy
when you travel around the world…”{PAUSE}“Want to hear what they are?”
{CHOICE}Tell me
{CHOICE}I already know

“Then let me explain
how to use the world map.”{PAUSE}“Well then, what do you want to know?”
{CHOICE}Changing camera angles
{CHOICE}Map indicators
{CHOICE}Operating the buttons

“Anything else you'd like to know?”
{CHOICE}Map indicators
{CHOICE}Operating the buttons
{CHOICE}Nope, I got it

“Anything else you want to ask?”
{CHOICE}Changing camera angles
{CHOICE}Operating the buttons
{CHOICE}No, that's all

“Anything else you want to ask?”
{CHOICE}Changing camera angles
{CHOICE}Map indicators
{CHOICE}No, that's all

“First press {PURPLE}[CAMERA]{WHITE}
to change the camera angle.”{PAUSE}“There are 2 angles to choose from,
select the one you like.”{PAUSE}“Then rotate the camera either way
by pressing {PURPLE}[PAGEUP]{WHITE}
or {PURPLE}[PAGEDOWN]{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“Try different angles until
you find the one you like best.
It makes the journey a lot more fun!”

“Press {PURPLE}[START]{WHITE}
once to view the World Map.”{PAUSE}“There is a large and small map.
Learn when to use which
and you won't get lost.”{PAUSE}“Push {PURPLE}[START]{WHITE} twice
to change the size of the map,
and once more to turn it off.”{PAUSE}“Pretty easy, huh?”

“Ride things by pressing
{PURPLE}[ASSIST]{WHITE} and
get off by pressing {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}.
This isn't so hard, either!”{PAUSE}“Oh, right. You can't dash
on the World Map, so make sure
not to press {PURPLE}[CANCEL]{WHITE}
unless you want to get off.”{PAUSE}“Remember this because
Chocobos will run away
as soon as you get off them,
so be careful.”

“Once on the World Map
you can access the menu
to save your game anywhere.
It's a good idea to save frequently!”{PAUSE}“Well then, bon voyage!”

“Is that so? Well, that's that.
Have a nice trip.”

{Cloud}
“Damn!!”

{Tifa}
“Oh! You!!”

{Cid}
“…Don't mess with me!!”

“Huh? You're looking for your friend?
You want to know where the Lifestream is?”{PAUSE}“Hmm, I can't help you find your friend,
but I've heard about the Lifestream.”{PAUSE}“When I traveled to the {CYAN}Southern islands{WHITE},
a doctor was very kind to me.
I seem to recall him telling me something
about the Lifestream…”

“Hey, listen to me!
The Shinra troops are on the move.”{PAUSE}“The TV news said Rufus came up with two plans.
One, is to launch a rocket into space
containing Huge Materia…”{PAUSE}“Is Huge Materia really that destructive?”

“Sephiroth put up a huge barrier
around the North Crater.”{PAUSE}“Rufus wants to use a mammoth cannon
to smash the barrier.”{PAUSE}“He plans to have Shinra troops
rush in and attack Sephiroth
after the barrier falls.”

“The North Crater barrier's
been demolished?”{PAUSE}“So now's the time to
defeat Sephiroth.”

“Hey, listen to me!
I heard the barrier
protecting Sephiroth is gone!”{PAUSE}“But with Rufus dead,
the Shinra troops don't know what to do.
Heidegger and Scarlet don't have
what it takes to lead the troops.”{PAUSE}“I really thought something was
finally going to happen,
but everything's the same…
Not a damn thing changes around here!”

“My old man was a miner, but
he couldn't go to work after monsters
started appearing in the Mythril Mines.”{PAUSE}“Now all he does is sit around
getting drunk in the bar…”

“My dad still just sits at the
bar drinking, even though
he knows Meteor's coming!”{PAUSE}“It's sad. Even though he's an adult,
he just doesn't want to see
the world as it really is.
I dunno what to do.”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}, you're late!”

{Barret}
“Yo man, you're late!”

{Cloud}
“Sorry to keep you waiting.”

{Aeris}
“Guess everyone's here now.”

{Barret}
“So let's hear your story…”{PAUSE}“You know, the one about Sephiroth
and the crisis of the Planet.”{PAUSE}“Let's hear it all.”

{Cloud}
“…I used to want to be like Sephiroth,
so I joined SOLDIER.”{PAUSE}“After working with Sephiroth
on several missions,
we became friends.”

{Barret}
“You call that a friend?”

{Cloud}
“Yeah, well…”{PAUSE}“He was older than me,
and hardly ever
talked about himself.”

{Cloud}
“So I guess you'd call us war buddies…
We trusted each other.
Until one day…”

{Tifa}
“…”

{Aeris}
“…One day?”

{Cloud}
“After the war it was SOLDIER's
duty to put down any resistance
against the Shinra.”

{Cloud}
“…That was five years ago.”{PAUSE}“I was 16…”

{Cloud}
“Sephiroth's strength is incredible.
He is far stronger in reality
than any stories you
may have heard about him.”

{Aeris}
“So…
Where do you come in?”

{Cloud}
“Me?
I was mesmerized by the
way Sephiroth fought.”

{Cloud}
“…and then
we reached Nibelheim.”

{Barret}
“I remember Jenova.
That's that damn headless spook
livin' in the Shinra building.”

{Cloud}
“That's right.”

{Tifa}
“{Barret},
would you please let us hear what
{Cloud} has to say?
You can ask questions later.”

{Barret}
“{Tifa}, I was only…”

{Tifa}
“OK {Cloud}, continue.”

{Aeris}
“The childhood friends are reunited!”

{Cloud}
“…I was really surprised
with {Tifa}.”

{Barret}
“Damn, Shinra!
The more I hear, the more I hate 'em!”

{Tifa}
“…Who would have ever
thought the Mako Reactor
held such a secret.”

{Aeris}
“{Tifa}…
Were you waiting outside then?”

{Tifa}
“…Yes.”

{Cloud}
“We returned to Nibelheim.
Sephiroth confined himself to the inn.
He didn't even try to talk to me.”

{Tifa}
“Then all of a sudden he
just disappeared, right?”

{Cloud}
“We found him inside
the biggest building in Nibelheim.”

{Tifa}
“The villagers used to call
it the Shinra mansion.”

{Cloud}
“Long ago, people from Shinra
used to live in that mansion…”

{Cloud}
“…and that's the end of my story.”

{Barret}
“Wait a damn minute!
That's it? No more?”

{Cloud}
“…I don't remember.”

{Aeris}
“What happened to Sephiroth?”

{Cloud}
“In terms of skill,
I couldn't have killed him.”

{Tifa}
“Official records state Sephiroth is dead.
I read it in the newspaper.”

{Aeris}
“Shinra, Inc. owns the newspapers,
so you can't rely on that.”

{Cloud}
“…I want to know the truth.
I want to know what happened.”{PAUSE}“I challenged Sephiroth and lived.
Why didn't he kill me?”

{Tifa}
“…I'm alive, too.”

{Aeris}
“A lot of this doesn't make sense.
What about Jenova?
It was in the Shinra building, right?”

{Cloud}
“Shinra shipped it
from Nibelheim to Midgar.”

{Aeris}
“Did someone carry it out later?
It was missing from the Shinra building.”

{Tifa}
“Sephiroth?”

{Barret}
“Damn!
None of this makes sense!”{PAUSE}“I'm going,
going,
going,
gone!”{PAUSE}“And I'm leavin' the thinkin' to you!”

{Barret}
“Yo, {Cloud}!
Let's get a move on!”
{CHOICE}Wait a sec
{CHOICE}Right

{Barret}
“{Cloud}, what's wrong?

Sephiroth heads for the Promised Land?”{PAUSE}“I ain't lettin' Sephiroth or

If they do,
then we're all screwed.”{PAUSE}“Y'know what I'm sayin'?”
{CHOICE}Beautiful, just beautiful!
{CHOICE}Is that all?

{Barret}
“Jus' leave it to me!”

{Barret}
“Fine!
That's good enough.”

{Barret}
“Yo, c'mon let's go!”

{Cloud}
“Oh brother…”

{Tifa}
“{Cloud}?”

{Tifa}
“How bad was I after
Sephiroth stabbed me?”

{Cloud}
“I thought you were a goner.
…I was so sad.”

{Aeris}
“I…”

{Aeris}
“The Ancients…Cetra…Jenova…
Sephiroth and myself…”

{Tifa}
“Let's go.
{Barret}'s waiting.”

{Red XIII}
“What a fascinating story…”

{Cloud}
“{Barret} and the others are
waiting for us at the inn.”

{Barret}
“Yo, {Cloud}.
Here.”

{Aeris}
“{Cloud}.
Take this.”

{Tifa}
“Oh, {Cloud}.
Let me give you this.”

{Tifa}
“Just use {PURPLE}[PHS]{WHITE},

“Alright then, we're outta here.”

“Well, I'll be going.”

{Barret}
“Yeah, maybe so.

“South of this town past the {CYAN}Mythril Mine{WHITE}
and far to the west
is a Shinra harbor called {CYAN}Junon{WHITE}.”{PAUSE}“They say there's a reactor and
many tall buildings there.
I hope to see it someday.”

“The world's at peace…
all's well.”

“Tomorrow's another day…
all's well.”

“I got my health,
and enough to eat…
all's well.”

“The world's changed a lot
in the past few days…”{PAUSE}“That huge Meteor is covering
up the sky and acting
like it owned it.”{PAUSE}“A lot of my friends
have died…”

“I'm goin' on a journey to
pray for their souls.”

“A map that was sunk along with the ship.
…"Guidebook"{OK}
A rose that blooms once every 1000 years
in the desert.
…"Desert Rose"{OK}
A harp that soothes those who hear it.
…"Earth Harp"”

“I wonder if there's anyone
who'll bring it to me?”

“Now if I can just get the "Guidebook",
I can start my journey…”

“Now if I can just get "Desert Rose",
I can start my journey…”

“Now if I can just get "Earth Harp",
I can start my journey…”

“"Guidebook" and "Desert Rose"…

“"Guidebook" and "Earth Harp"…
Will you guys look for them for me?”

“"Desert Rose" and "Earth Harp"…
